tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE patents (
    patent_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    title VARCHAR(255),
    inventor VARCHAR(255),
    filing_date DATE,
    status VARCHAR(50)
)

CREATE TABLE patents ( 
    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY, 
    title VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, 
    inventor VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL, 
    filing_date DATE NOT NULL, 
    category VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL 
);

CREATE TABLE intellectual_property ( 
    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY, 
    patent_id INT NOT NULL, 
    description TEXT NOT NULL, 
    status VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL, 
    FOREIGN KEY (patent_id) REFERENCES patents(id) 
);

CREATE TABLE patents (
    patent_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    inventor_name VARCHAR(255),
    invention_description TEXT,
    application_date DATE,
    approval_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE industrial_inventions (
    invention_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    invention_name VARCHAR(255),
    industry_type VARCHAR(100),
    invention_description TEXT,
    inventor_id INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (inventor_id) REFERENCES patents(patent_id)
);

CREATE TABLE intellectual_property_rights (
    property_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    property_type VARCHAR(100),
    property_description TEXT,
    inventor_id INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (inventor_id) REFERENCES patents(patent_id)
);
